title: MixTum.io
author: MixTum.io
created_time: December 01, 2023, 12:17:46 AMLast edit: January 19, 2024, 03:56:58 AM by MixTum.io
content: Friends, as you know, the Bitcointalk administration has introduced a ban on advertising and discussion of all Bitcoin mixers. Links were filtered and our discussion thread was automatically renamed and blocked. [banned mixer] - Premium Bitcoin Mixer | Launched in 2018 üõ°Ô∏è.This is sad news, but nevertheless it did not in any way affect our uninterrupted work. - Over the past 5 years we have worked without failures!- Our discussion thread has received 25,000 views and hundreds of comments.- Our thread has been translated into 8 languages.- We have repeatedly supported non-profit user events!Also, we want to continue to be in touch with you, so the discussion has moved to another forum!
